column1:
legoparent,"2010-12-30T13:17:47.57Z","Orient Yourself with this Lego Game","

Fantastic Theme.
A Lego store employee said he bought this game to use solely as parts.
Thats what I did,to use as parts to supplement other sets.
Most lego games are a great way to obtain parts not normally available in main line sets.
And yes, if you enjoy the game by all means, play it to.

Drake_bd,"2011-02-11T12:10:50.207Z","Fun game for three players.","Hi,

I bought this set on a school trip to France for â‚¬21.59. I think that price is ok.
When I came home, I had to build it immediatly and play the game.

The first time I played it, it wasn't what I expected. Although it was fun but I thought it was game about trading and working together, which couldn't realise my expectations.

When I played it again, I tried out my own rules and it turned out in a great game.

I think that you should play the game with more than two persons. It's a game with a lot of possibilities, so try to make your own rules, it will make the game more fun.
column2:
All I can say is that it's really worth buying. I hope you liked my first review.
",TRUE,4,5,4,5,4
